column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Well it’s Monday and therefore time to catch up on my reading by having Greg Dworkin call and read me the news. It’s a pretty good service! I spent a good portion of the weekend unplugging electronics and then plugging them back in again which sounds uncomplicated but is actually a major project wherein you relearn the reasons why thing seemed so illogically arranged in the first place. That’s not actually news of course. It’s just my excuse for why I don’t know what the news is. But that doesn’t mean I didn’t peek at the news several times over the weekend and then put stories aside for exploring today. I always do that! Because I’m thinking of you dear listeners! Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold.
